text: De, kavɨla gasak wakundun Jisasɨtɨk yila Farisitɨle* autundi yila Herotkɨk* autu apɨsukuve ga ŋɨmeve Jisas apɨpɨlaivaŋga pave, kape wokok safutuk yila wulu mandɨve sivɨtvaŋga pave.12.13 Kavɨla Farisitɨle autun kavɨla Herotkɨk autu towok gɨlipeve. Miyakavik kavɨla Herotkɨk autun kavɨla Farisitɨle autu towok gɨlipeve. Kape vala wofopɨn Jisas gɨlipeve, towok vaŋ. Kapekandi valan mfakuŋgumɨ yila wulu wunutuk muwɨ kombɨiyeve. Kavik juŋaveve, wun Sisatɨk masivapa galavalen, kavɨla Farisitɨle autun yila wulu wokok safutuk mandɨve sivɨlapa. Kape Sisatɨk masivandu galavalen kavɨla Herotkɨk autun yila wulu wokok safutuk mandɨve sivɨlapa.
